meaning: A person you know well and like, and who is not usually a member of your family.
A greeting or expression used when meeting someone.
A polite expression used when acknowledging a gift, service, or compliment.
A group consisting of parents and their children, or all the descendants of a common ancestor.
An intense feeling of deep affection for someone or something.
Substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.
A building for human habitation, especially one that is lived in by a family or small group of people.
An institution for educating children or giving instruction in a particular subject.
Activity involving mental or physical effort done in order to achieve a purpose or result.
A set of written or printed pages bound together and enclosed between covers.
A colorless, transparent, odorless liquid that forms the seas, lakes, rivers, and rain.
A domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout and barks.
A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short snout, and retractile claws.
A large town or a densely populated urban area.
The period of darkness in each twenty-four hours; the time from sunset to sunrise.
A period of twenty-four hours as a unit of time, reckoned from one midnight to the next.
Vocal or instrumental sounds combined in such a way as to produce beauty of form, harmony, and expression of emotion.
Feeling or showing pleasure or contentment.
The star around which the earth orbits.
The indefinite continued progress of existence and events in the past, present, and future.
